NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Basketball and Attendance or the cell corresponding to Music and Ratings?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Basketball} and {Attendance} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Movies and Sponsorship or the cell corresponding to Music and Viewership?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Movies} and {Sponsorship} has a higher heat value.

NC.Q: Which has the higher heat value: the cell corresponding to Events and Fan Engagement or the cell corresponding to Streaming and Viewership?
NC.A: The cell corresponding to {Events} and {Fan Engagement} has a higher heat value.

MSR.Q: In the heatmap, what are the row and column labels for all cells whose heat values fall within the range of 0.54 to 0.69?
MSR.A: The cells are: {(Basketball, Revenue), (Basketball, Royalties), (Events, Royalties), (Football, Royalties), (Football, Sponsorship), (Gaming, Sponsorship), (Gaming, Streaming Hours), (Gaming, Ticket Sales), (Gaming, Viewership)}.
